en: The European Film Forum goes to Sarajevo
The 2015 European Film Forum will be from 20-21 August at the Hotel Europe, in Sarajevo.
47-Event (announcement, program or report of an event such as a seminar, conference, exhibition, etc.)

The 2015 European Film Forum will be from 20-21 August at the Hotel Europe, in Sarajevo. The forum will discuss access to regional theatres for European films, as well as coproduction in the digital age.

This year's European film forum will discuss access to regional theatres for European films, as well as coproduction in a borderless digital world.

The Sarajevo film festival is the most important festival in the region, and the discussions will be held within the framework of the Regional Forum.

The Film Forum will take place at the famous Hotel Europe, located in the heart of Sarajevo, on 20-21 August.

More information on the event will be published on the Sarajevo Film Festival website.
